item.name: Clear Liquid Reagent
item.desc: A Catalyst that can be applied to various Alchemy mixtures.\n- How to Obtain: It can be made using Alchemy.

item.name: Clear Liquid Reagent
item.desc: A Catalyst that can be applied to various Alchemy mixtures.\n- How to Obtain: It can be made using Alchemy.

item.name: Cloud Mushroom
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used as an ingredient in Alchemy and Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Glish Swamp and Southern Cienaga. Cloud Mushrooms can be Gathered using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!

item.name: Bear Blood
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be extracted from a bear corpse using a Fluid Collector.

item.name: Wild Grass
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained from Wild Herbs using Barehanded Gathering.

item.name: Weeds
item.desc: It’s just a useless weed. You can sell it for a cheap price to merchants.
